title: Fix incorrect payloadtool CLI usage in optimization skills
close_reason: Fixed incorrect payloadtool CLI usage in all optimization skills

comments.author: Brian L. Troutwine
comments.text:
The optimization skills (hunt, rescue, review, validate) use incorrect payloadtool CLI syntax throughout. They reference `./target/release/payloadtool <generator> --total-bytes 10000000` but the actual CLI takes a config YAML file as the first argument and has no --total-bytes flag.

Correct CLI from payloadtool.rs:262-279:
  ./target/release/payloadtool <config_path> [--generator-id ID] [--fingerprint] [--verify FILE] [--memory-stats]

Files affected:
- .claude/skills/lading:optimize:hunt/SKILL.md
- .claude/skills/lading:optimize:rescue/SKILL.md
- .claude/skills/lading:optimize:review/SKILL.md
- .claude/skills/lading:optimize:validate/SKILL.md
- .claude/skills/lading:preflight/SKILL.md
